document_data.name: Jonah
document_data.mainbody:
'''Jonah''' was a news hawker who worked for the ''[[Baldur's Mouth]] Gazette'' in the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|''"The Baldur's Mouth Gazette. When the Mouth barks, the Fist bites..." Uh... I forget the real slogan, but you get the idea. Now, buy a copy or leave.''|Jonah}}
document_data.Description: Jonah was a dusky-skinned [[human]] child with icy-blue eyes and hazel hair.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, during the [[Absolute crisis]], Jonah could often be found peddling the ''Baldur's Mouth Gazette'' in the Lower City near the [[Manor Gate]]. Jonah could not stand the [[broadsheet]] he peddled. Jonah worked for the Mouth only because his father forced him to.
